entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
